system.requirements:
Tier 1; Ferric Lure, Mechanicus Implants
Aptitudes: Willpower, Tech, Unaligned
system.effect: Character can call an unsecured Metal Object to their hand from up to 40 metres away using Ferric Lure Implants. Object may be up to 2kg*WP Bonus in weight.

description.value: Character can call an unsecured Metal Object to their hand from up to 40 metres away using Ferric Lure Implants. Object may be up to 2kg*WP Bonus in weight.
